QuestData.Title: Words of Power
QuestData.Description: The lich has spoken, $n. The high priests of En'kilah hold the secret to entering Naxxanar.$B$BGo to the Spire of Blood, the Spire of Pain and the Spire of Decay and slay each of the priests.$B$BReturn once you've obtained the three scrolls.
QuestData.LogDescription: Thassarian at the Wailing Ziggurat wants you to go to the Temple City of En'kilah and retrieve High Priest Talet-Kha's Scroll from the Spire of Pain, High Priest Naferset's Scroll from the Spire of Decay and High Priest Andorath's Scroll at the Spire of Blood.
QuestData.CompletionText: Taking your time, are you? I don't know how much longer I can keep this lich restrained.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n. Now for one last bit of information.
